sub_title: Senior architect at Gortemaker Algra Feenstra architects & Dutch Health Architects (DHA)
summary:
Since 1999 I have been working as a project architect on a wide range of buildings for mainly (but not only) the healthcare sector in The Netherlands and abroad. I feel privileged to be able to work on socially important projects such as hospitals and by doing so contributing to a better healthcare delivery all over the world. Solving complex logistical issues, organizing clear functional structures and creating pleasant ‘healing architecture’ is my main objective at the start of every new project. The dynamic world of working in an international context and various cultural environments inspires me even more to do what I do best; creating high future value through design by optimal functionality and humane architecture, resulting in (hospital) buildings which are being widely appreciated.

Main & current projects:
- Renovation and extension of general hospital, Spisská Nová Ves, Slovakia | 2023
- Campus wide reconstruction masterplan for UMCG (UB35), Groningen | 2022
- Consultant to the Government of Ukraine regarding State Construction Standards for healthcare facilities | 2020
-Cityhospital Lüneburg, Lüneburg, Germany | 2020
- Multifunctional Medical Center Skolkovo, Moscow, Russia | 2019
- Masterplanning redevelopment 4 state hospitals, Johannesburg, South Africa | 2018
- New Honvéd Hospital, Budapest, Hungary | 2018
- HALIX Bioscience GMP-facility, Leiden | 2018
- UKE Martini Klinik, Hamburg, Germany | 2017
- Gansu Provincial Woman & Child Medical Center, Lanzhou, Gansu, China | 2017
- Next Generation Hospital (Bory hospital), Bratislava, Slovakia | 2016 - 2021
- Champion hospital, Kuwait City, Kuwait | 2015
- HUS Cancer Center, Helsinki, Finland | 2015
- Middle East Heart Cardiac Center, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia | 2015
- New KSSHP hospital, Jyväskylä, Finland | 2015
- New Matara hospital, Matara, Sri Lanka | 2015
- Grand Medica Medical Center, Novokuznetsk, Russia | 2015
- Next Generation Hospital, Michalovce, Slovakia | 2014
- Diagnostics Center Rashid Hospital, Dubai, United Arab Emirates | 2013
- Wanica Medical Center, Paramaribo, Suriname | 2013
- Honliv Hospital Oncology Center, Changyuan, Henan, China | 2012
- Productionplant for (hospital)pharmaceuticals (Apotheek A15), Gorinchem | 2011-2012
- Policlinical treatment center university hospital, Leuven, Belgium | 2011
- Erasmus MC university hospital, Rotterdam | 1999-2010
